test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 09 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f31d2ba086d1322be347

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.<br />
7 : 330 :: ? : 203 :: 9 : 716

english.explanation: The pattern follows the formula n³ - 13. For 7: 7³ -13 = 330. For 9: 9³ -13 = 716. Solving for 203: x³ -13 = 203 → x³ = 216 → x = 6.
P is the mother of Q, Q is the brother of R, and R is the son of S. S is the father of T. Thus, P is the mother of T.

hindi.explanation: P - Q का अर्थ P, Q की माँ है। Q % R का अर्थ Q, R का भाई है। R & S का अर्थ R, S का पुत्र है। S + T का अर्थ S, T का पिता है। अतः P, T की माँ है।

questions.original_question:
By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?<br />
8 and 2

english.explanation: Swapping 8 and 2 in option 3 gives 2×4+6−8÷1=8+6−8=6, which matches the equation.

hindi.explanation: 8 और 2 को आपस में बदलने पर समीकरण 2 × 4 + 6 − 8 ÷ 1 = 8 + 6 − 8 = 6 होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers, from amongst the given options, should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(18 + (12 × 6) + (63 ÷ 7) × 4 +{(27)^{\frac{1}{3}}}-11=112\:\)</span></p>

hindi.explanation: समीकरण के बाद के मान की तुलना करने पर, 6 और 4 को आपस में बदलने पर समीकरण सही होता है।

questions.original_question:
Which of the following letter clusters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the following letter cluster series?<br />
OG, RL, XQ, GV, ?

english.explanation: First letters increase by 3, 6, -17, 12; second letters increase by 5 each time. Next term is SA (S and A).

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों के अनुक्रम में दूसरा अक्षर प्रत्येक चरण में 5 अक्षर आगे बढ़ता है (G→L→Q→V→A)। पहला अक्षर पहले +3, +6, -17 और फिर + अंक के साथ परिवर्तित होता है। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, अगला अक्षर S होगा।

english.explanation: Ordering by dictionary: Historian (2), Historical (4), History (1), Hobnail (3), Hobnob (5).

hindi.explanation: शब्दकोश क्रम में: 2. Historian, 1. History, 4. Historical, 5. Hobnob, 3. Hobnail। सबसे पहले 'Historian' आएगा, फिर 'History', फिर 'Historical', फिर 'Hobnob' और अंत में 'Hobnail'।

english.explanation: Milk is measured in liters; Sugar is measured in kilograms.

hindi.explanation: दूध को 'लीटर' में मापा जाता है और चीनी को 'किलोग्राम' में मापा जाता है।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: All R are H does not imply All H are R or All T are H. Some T are R invalidates conclusion III.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. कोई निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है
hindi.explanation: कथन I और II से निष्कर्ष निकाले जा सकते हैं कि कुछ T, H हैं, लेकिन निष्कर्ष I, II या III में से कोई भी तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण नहीं करता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;KNIGHT&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;PMRTSG&rsquo; and &lsquo;FELLOW&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;UVOOLD&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;DECENT&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by a unique pattern (e.g., +19, +17, etc.), resulting in WVXVMG.

hindi.explanation: 'KNIGHT' को 'PMRTSG' के रूप में कूटबद्ध करने पर अगला अक्षर आगे के अक्षर के साथ परिवर्तित होता है। इसी तरह, 'DECENT' को 'WXVVMG' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाएगा।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;FUND&rsquo; is written as &#39;FOVH&#39; and &#39;SEND&#39; is written as &#39;FOFU&#39;. How will &#39;GIFT&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Reversing GIFT and applying shifts to each letter yields IKGV when reversed back.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर के साथ परिवर्तित करके कूटबद्ध किया जाता है। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, 'GIFT' को 'HIGW' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाएगा।

questions.original_question: If A + B means that A is the father of B, A &divide; B means that A is the mother of B, A&nbsp;&times; B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that Q is the sister of P?

english.explanation: Q is the sister of P if both are children of the same parent (Q×P÷R).

hindi.explanation: Q × P ÷ R का अर्थ है Q, P का भाई है और R, P की माँ है। इस प्रकार Q, P की बहन है।

english.explanation: Both pairs represent physical quantities and their SI units.

hindi.explanation: लंबाई की इकाई मीटर है और विद्युत धारा की इकाई एम्पियर है। दोनों में संबंध इकाई का है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure which is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F2_Madhuri_SSC_20.03.2023_D15.png" style="width: 87px; height: 70px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure matches option 4 after checking dimensions and patterns.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में सन्निहित चौथी आकृति है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: All others are in forward alphabetical order; LNM is in reverse order.

hindi.explanation: XYZ, ABC, IJK अक्षर-समूह वर्णमाला के क्रम में हैं, जबकि LNM विपरीत क्रम में है।

english.explanation: Each set follows the pattern (a + b, a - b, a + b). For (56,6,34): 56-6=50, 56+6=62. (52,22,38) follows a similar pattern.

questions.original_question:
By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?<br />
5 and 9

english.explanation: After swapping 5 and 9 in option 4: (5 × 4) + 9 – (8 ÷ 2) = 20 + 9 – 4 = 25. This satisfies the equation. Other options fail to meet the required result after swapping.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक विकल्प में 5 और 9 को आपस में बदलकर समीकरण की जाँच करें। विकल्प 4 में, स्थान बदले बाद समीकरण होगा: 5 × 4 + 9 - 8 ÷ 2 = 25। गणना करने पर: 5×4=20, 8÷2=4, 20+9=29, 29-4=25। इसलिए विकल्प 4 सही है।
key_concepts: बीजगणितीय समीकरण की सत्यता की जाँच

options.value: Only conclusions I and II follow.
Only conclusions I and III follow.
Only conclusions II and III follow.

english.correct_answer: 4. Only conclusions II and III follow.
english.explanation: Conclusion II follows via contrapositive of 'No vegetable is healthy'. Conclusion III follows because 'Some apples are fruits' and 'All fruits are vegetables' imply 'Some vegetables are apples'. Conclusion I does not follow because not all apples are necessarily healthy.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F2_Madhuri_SSC_20.03.2023_D28.png" style="width: 476px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves rotation and addition of elements. The correct option (Option 2) continues the sequence by completing the rotational and incremental pattern.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शृंखला में, प्रत्येक आकृति में लाइनों की संख्या में एक निश्चित पैटर्न दिखाई देता है। उदाहरण के लिए, पहली आकृति में 3 लाइनें हो सकती हैं, दूसरी में 4, और तीसरी में 5, इस प्रकार अगली आकृति में 6 लाइनें होनी चाहिए। विकल्प 3 में प्रस्तुत आकृति इस पैटर्न का पालन करती है, क्योंकि यह एक छह-भुजा आकृति है जो पिछली आकृतियों के परिवर्तन के अनुसार उपयुक्त है। अतः, विकल्प 3 सही उत्तर है।
key_concepts: आकृतियों में लाइनों की संख्या का पैटर्न

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (&ndash;) is related to the number of the right side of (&ndash;) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: Options 1, 2, and 4 follow the rule: (n × 2) + 1. Option 3 follows (n × 2), making it the odd one out.

key_concepts: गणितीय संक्रियाओं का उपयोग (गुणा और जोड़)
संख्याओं के बीच पैटर्न ज्ञात करना
विकल्पों की तुलना द्वारा विषम चयन करना

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term and the sixth term is related to the fifth term.<br />
27 : 713 :: 32 : ? :: 35 : 1209

english.explanation: The pattern is n² – 16. For 27: 27² – 16 = 713; for 35: 35² – 16 = 1209. Applying this to 32: 32² – 16 = 1008.

key_concepts: संख्याओं के बीच गणितीय संबंध की जाँच करना
अंतर और अनुक्रम की पहचान करना
सूत्र विकसित करना: आधार संख्या × (आधार संख्या - 1) + जोड़ी गई संख्या

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at line MN as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F2_Madhuri_SSC_20.03.2023_D41.png" style="width: 146px; height: 96px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reverses the original horizontally. Option 2 correctly reflects this reversal across line MN.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब जब रेखा MN पर रखा जाता है, तो दिए गए संयोजन का वामावर्त उलटा प्रतिबिम्ब दर्शाता है। इसमें दर्पण रेखा MN के दाईं ओर और बाईं ओर आकृतियाँ एक-दूसरे के प्रतिबिम्ब के रूप में दिखाई देती हैं। विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया प्रतिबिम्ब संयोजन के अक्षीय सममिति के अनुसार सही दर्पण चित्र है।
key_concepts: अक्षीय सममिति (Line MN के संदर्भ में)

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;1&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F2_Madhuri_SSC_20.03.2023_D47.png" style="width: 252px; height: 112px;" /></p>

english.explanation: From the dice positions, 1 is adjacent to 2, 3, 4, and 5. The remaining number, 6, must be opposite 1.

hindi.explanation: एक पासे की तीन स्थितियों में, फलक '1' के आसन्न फलकों की संख्या 2, 3 और 5 हैं। चूंकि एक फलक का विपरीत फलक उन संख्याओं में से नहीं हो सकता जो आसन्न हों, इसलिए '1' का विपरीत फलक 6 है। अन्य विकल्पों में 2, 3 और 4 आसन्न फलक हैं, जबकि 6 विपरीत फलक है।
hindi.key_concepts: पासे के फलक, आसन्न और विपरीत फलक, संख्याओं की व्यवस्था

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F2_Madhuri_SSC_20.03.2023_D50.png" style="width: 352px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series rotates 90° clockwise each step. Option 2 continues this rotational pattern.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति शृंखला में पैटर्न का अवलोकन करने पर यह स्पष्ट होता है कि आकृतियां घड़ी की सुई की दिशा में 90° घूम रही हैं। अगली आकृति में नियमित घूर्णन पैटर्न के अनुसार प्रश्न चिह्न (?) को बदलने वाली आकृति विकल्प 2 है, जो पिछले घूर्णन के बाद सही दिशा में है।

questions.original_question:
Which of the following number will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?<br />
137, 114, ?, 91, 183

key_concepts: अनुक्रम में विषम और सम स्थितियों के अलग-अलग पैटर्न
अंकों के बीच अंतर की जांच
अंकों के जोड़ या घटाने के पैटर्न की पहचान

questions.original_question:
A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.<br />
SMQ, WUZ, ACI, EKR, ?

english.explanation: The first letters follow +4, -22, +4 (mod 26). Second letters follow +8, -18, +8 (mod 26). Third letters follow +9, -17, +9 (mod 26). The next term is ISA.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए अनुक्रम में प्रत्येक पद के तीनों अक्षरों के अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला स्थिति संख्याओं पर ध्यान दें। पहले अक्षर में प्रत्येक चरण में 4 की वृद्धि होती है (S(19) → W(23) → A(1) → E(5) → I(9))। दूसरे अक्षर में 8 की वृद्धि होती है (M(13) → U(21) → C(3) → K(11) → S(19))। तीसरे अक्षर में 9 की वृद्धि होती है (Q(17) → Z(26) → I(9) → R(18) → A(1))। इस प्रकार अगला पद "ISA" होगा।
key_concepts: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला की स्थिति संख्याओं की गणना
अनुक्रम में अंकों के बीच वृद्धि/कमी की पहचान
वर्णमाला के अंत और शुरुआत पर लपेटने की समझ

questions.original_question: How many Lok Sabha constituencies are there in India?

hindi.explanation: भारत में लोकसभा के 543 निर्वाचन क्षेत्र हैं, जिनमें से प्रत्येक लोकसभा सदस्य को एक निर्वाचन क्षेत्र के मतदाताओं द्वारा निर्वाचित किया जाता है। यह आंकड़ा लगभग 93 करोड़ मतदाताओं को शामिल करता है।

questions.original_question: <p>In 1887, the Royal Society, London gave the Davy Medal for the &lsquo;discovery of the periodic law of chemical elements&rsquo; to _________.</p>

english.explanation: The Davy Medal in 1887 was awarded to Dmitri Mendeleev for his formulation of the periodic law of chemical elements. While others contributed to early periodic table concepts, Mendeleev's work was most influential.

hindi.explanation: 1887 में रॉयल सोसाइटी ने आवर्त नियम की खोज के लिए दमित्री मेंडेलीव को डेवी मेडल दिया। मेंडेलीव ने तत्वों को परमाणु द्रव्यमान के आधार पर व्यवस्थित किया और अज्ञात तत्वों की पूर्वानुमान भी दिया।

questions.original_question: Name the committee formed for the Village and Small-scale Industries in 1955?

english.explanation: The Karve Committee (1955) was established to examine village and small-scale industries, recommending policies for rural development. Other committees are unrelated to this topic.

hindi.explanation: 1955 में ग्रामीण और लघु उद्योगों के लिए कर्वे समिति का गठन किया गया था। इस समिति ने इन उद्योगों के विकास के लिए योजनाएं तैयार कीं।

questions.original_question: In November 2022, Technology Transfer Scheme is implemented by which of these states?

english.explanation: Maharashtra launched the Technology Transfer Scheme in November 2022 to promote innovation and industry collaboration.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2022 में आंध्र प्रदेश ने प्रौद्योगिकी हस्तांतरण योजना शुरू की, जो उद्यमियों को नवाचार और उत्पादन में सहायता करती है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following performed a ritual called &lsquo;hiranya-garbha&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Krishna I of the Rashtrakuta dynasty performed the 'hiranya-garbha' ritual, a symbolic act of royal authority and land ownership.

hindi.explanation: दंतिदुर्ग ने 8वीं शताब्दी में 'हिरण्य-गर्भ' अनुष्ठान किया, जो राष्ट्रीय शक्ति के रूप में गणना किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Acts of the British Parliament stated that a member of the British Cabinet was appointed Secretary of State for India?

english.explanation: The Government of India Act 1858 transferred control from the East India Company to the British Crown and established the post of Secretary of State for India.

hindi.explanation: नियामक अधिनियम, 1773 में ब्रिटिश मंत्रिमंडल के एक सदस्य को भारत के लिए राज्य सचिव नियुक्त करने का प्रावधान था। यह अंग्रेजी ईस्ट इंडिया कंपनी के प्रबंधन पर नियंत्रण स्थापित करने के लिए बनाया गया था।

questions.original_question: Against whom was the Battle of Plassey (1757) fought by the English Company led by Robert Clive?

english.explanation: The Battle of Plassey (1757) was fought between the British East India Company (led by Robert Clive) and Siraj Ud Daulah, the Nawab of Bengal.

hindi.explanation: प्लासी का युद्ध 1757 में रॉबर्ट क्लाइव के नेतृत्व में अंग्रेजी कंपनी और बंगाल के नवाब सिराज उद दौला के बीच लड़ा गया था।

questions.original_question: In July 2022, the Supreme Court accepted the report of the Banthia Commission. In its report, the commission recommended that OBCs should be given up to _______ reservation in local bodies.

english.explanation: The Banthia Commission (2022) recommended up to 27% reservation for OBCs in local bodies, addressing underrepresentation in governance.

hindi.explanation: बांठिया आयोग ने सिफारिश की कि ओबीसी को स्थानीय निकायों में 27 प्रतिशत आरक्षण दिया जाना चाहिए, जो अस्पृश्यता के समाप्त करने के लिए आंदोलन के परिणामस्वरूप थी।

questions.original_question: The mode of transport to reach the most remote and distant areas which are most inaccessible is ______.

english.explanation: Airways are the most effective mode for reaching inaccessible and remote areas, bypassing terrain and infrastructure limitations.

hindi.explanation: वायुमार्ग सर्वाधिक दुर्गम और दुरूह स्थानों तक पहुंचने के लिए उपयोगी है क्योंकि यह प्राकृतिक बाधाओं को पार कर सकता है।

questions.original_question: How many rights are mentioned under &ldquo;Right to Equality&rdquo;?

english.explanation: The 'Right to Equality' (Articles 14–18) includes four rights: equality before law, prohibition of discrimination, equality of opportunity, and abolition of untouchability.

hindi.explanation: संविधान के अनुच्छेद 14 से 18 तक 'समानता का अधिकार' के अंतर्गत 6 अधिकारों का उल्लेख किया गया है, जैसे समान नागरिक अधिकार और आरक्षण।

questions.original_question: Which low-calorie sweetener has the chemical formula C<sub>14</sub>H<sub>18</sub>N<sub>2</sub>O<sub>5</sub> that is two hundred times sweeter than sugar?

english.explanation: Aspartame (C14H18N2O5) is a low-calorie sweetener 200 times sweeter than sugar. Its chemical formula matches the question.

hindi.explanation: सुक्रालोज का रासायनिक सूत्र C14H18N2O5 है और यह शर्करा की तुलना में 200 गुना अधिक मीठा है। यह कम कैलोरी वाला मीठा है।

questions.original_question: Techniques of making silk were first invented in China around _____ years ago.

english.explanation: Silk production in China dates back ~5000 years, with evidence from the Neolithic Yangshao culture.

hindi.explanation: रेशम बनाने की तकनीक का आविष्कार चीन में लगभग 9000 वर्ष पूर्व किया गया था, जो रेशम के उत्पादन और व्यापार की शुरुआत थी।

questions.original_question: The first edition of the Common wealth Youth Games was organised in which of the following years?

english.explanation: The first Commonwealth Youth Games were held in 2008 in Manchester, UK, for athletes aged 14–18.

hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रमंडल युवा खेल का पहला संस्करण 2000 में सिडनी में आयोजित किया गया था, जो युवा खिलाड़ियों के लिए एक प्लेटफॉर्म प्रदान करता है।

questions.original_question: The ceremony that marks the end of Republic Day celebrations is ________.

options.value: the fly-past by the Indian Air Force fighter aircraft
the &lsquo;At Home&rsquo; ceremony at Rashtrapati Bhawan
the homage ceremony at National War Memorial

english.explanation: The Beating Retreat ceremony marks the end of Republic Day celebrations, involving military bands and honoring service personnel.

hindi.explanation: गणतंत्र दिवस समारोह के अंत का प्रतीक बीटिंग रिट्रीट समारोह है, जो आर्मी बैंड के द्वारा अहमदाबाद में लंबे रॉकेट के साथ आयोजित किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following pairs of countries hosted the FIVB Volleyball Men&#39;s World Championship in 2022?

english.explanation: Italy and Poland co-hosted the FIVB Volleyball Men's World Championship in 2022.

hindi.explanation: 2022 में FIVB पुरुष वॉलीबॉल विश्व चैंपियनशिप की मेजबानी पोलैंड और स्लोवेनिया द्वारा की गई थी। यह खेल अक्टूबर-नवंबर 2022 में आयोजित किया गया।

questions.original_question: Polar easterlies are which kind of winds?

english.explanation: Polar easterlies are global wind patterns that blow consistently from the east in high latitudes (60° to 90°). They are part of the permanent wind systems caused by the Earth's rotation and temperature gradients. Seasonal winds like monsoons change direction with seasons, while local winds are short-range. Sea storms are temporary weather events.

hindi.explanation: ध्रुवीय पूर्वी पवनें ध्रुवीय क्षेत्रों में पाई जाने वाली स्थायी पवनें हैं। ये पवनें ध्रुवों से निकलकर 60° अक्षांशों तक चलती हैं और पूर्व से पश्चिम की ओर घूमती हैं। ये पवनें मौसम या स्थानीय कारकों पर निर्भर नहीं होती हैं, इसलिए वे स्थायी पवनें कहलाती हैं।

english.explanation: Suchitra K Ella was appointed as Director General of Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) in October 2022. This is a factual appointment and aligns with government records. The other options are names of public figures but not associated with this role.

hindi.explanation: सुचित्रा के. एला ने अक्टूबर 2022 में कर्मचारी राज्य बीमा निगम (ESI) के महानिदेशक के पद पर काबिज होने की घोषणा की गई। वह इस पद पर नियुक्ति के लिए अपनी अनुभव और विशेषज्ञता के कारण चयनित की गईं।

questions.original_question: Identify the longest part of the bacterial flagellum.

english.explanation: The bacterial flagellum consists of three parts: basal body (anchor), hook (flexible joint), and filament (long, whip-like structure). The filament is the longest part responsible for movement. The other options are smaller components.

hindi.explanation: जीवाणु कशाभिका (बैक्टीरियल फ्लैजेलम) के भागों में आधारीय शरीर, अंकुश और पूँछ शामिल हैं। पूँछ जीवाणु के गति के लिए उत्तरदायी होती है और इसकी लंबाई सभी भागों में सबसे अधिक होती है।

questions.original_question: Borgeet, a musical composition, is used in which of the following classical dances of India?

english.explanation: Borgeet is a devotional musical form from Assam, integral to Sattriya dance, which originated in Assam. Manipuri and Bharatanatyam are other classical dances, while Kathak is not associated with Borgeet.

hindi.explanation: बोरगीत प्राचीन शास्त्रीय गीत-संगीत है जो मणिपुरी नृत्य के साथ बरते जाते हैं। मणिपुरी नृत्य में बोरगीत का प्रयोग धार्मिक और सामाजिक अवसरों पर किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cells line the spongocoels and canals in members of the phylum Porifera?

english.explanation: Sponges (phylum Porifera) have collar cells (choanocytes) lining their spongocoel and canals. These cells filter food and create water currents. Somatic cells are general body cells, white cells are unrelated, and sex cells are gametes.

hindi.explanation: पोरिफेरा संघ के सदस्यों (जैसे स्पंज) में कॉलर कोशिकाएं (choanocytes) स्पंजगुहा और नलिकाओं की रेखा का निर्माण करती हैं। ये कोशिकाएं जल के प्रवाह को नियंत्रित करती हैं और भोजन का अवशोषण करती हैं।

questions.original_question: Chilika lake is situated in which of the following states?

english.explanation: Chilika Lake, Asia's largest brackish water lagoon, is located in Odisha. It is a Ramsar site and supports diverse wildlife. Other states listed do not have this lake.

hindi.explanation: चिल्का झील ओडिशा राज्य में स्थित है। यह भारत की सबसे बड़ी खारे पानी की झील है और मुख्य रूप से कृषि और मत्स्य पालन के लिए जानी जाती है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following sites do &ldquo;Not&rdquo; have coal mines?

english.explanation: Sonipat (Haryana) is not known for coal mines. Korba (Chhattisgarh), Neyveli (Tamil Nadu), and Singareni (Telangana) are major coal-producing regions in India.

hindi.explanation: सोनीपत में कोयला खदानें नहीं हैं। नेवेली (छत्तीसगढ़), कोरबा (छत्तीसगढ़) और सिंगरेनी (आंध्र प्रदेश) में कोयला खदानें हैं, जबकि सोनीपत में ऐसा खनिज संसाधन उपलब्ध नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Hema Malini, a well-known Bharatnatyam dancer and Bollywood actor, received which of the following honours of Indian civilians given by the Government of India in 2000?

english.explanation: Hema Malini received the Padma Bhushan in 2000 for her contributions to dance and cinema. Bharat Ratna is the highest civilian award, but she received it in 2014. Padma Shri and Padma Vibhushan are lower in hierarchy.

hindi.explanation: हेमा मालिनी को भारत सरकार द्वारा 2000 में पद्म भूषण से सम्मानित किया गया था। यह पुरस्कार उनके नृत्य और बॉलीवुड में योगदान के लिए दिया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following dance forms is performed to Carnatic music?

english.explanation: Kuchipudi, a classical dance of Andhra Pradesh, is performed to Carnatic music. Other options like Kathak and Odissi use Hindustani or regional music styles.

hindi.explanation: कुचिपुड़ी नृत्य दक्षिण भारतीय नृत्य शैली है जो कर्नाटक संगीत के साथ जुड़ा हुआ है। यह नृत्य डांस और संगीत के समन्वय के लिए जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: If marginal propensity to consume is denoted by c, then government expenditure multiplier can be expressed as _______.

english.explanation: The government expenditure multiplier formula is $ \frac{1}{1 - c} $, where $ c $ is the marginal propensity to consume. This reflects the total increase in output from a unit increase in government spending in a closed economy.

hindi.explanation: सरकारी व्यय गुणक की गणना सीमांत उपभोग प्रवृत्ति (c) के आधार पर की जाती है। सूत्र 1/(1 - c) है क्योंकि सरकारी व्यय आय के स्तर में परिवर्तन को बढ़ाता है।

questions.original_question: Monty paid a simple interest of Rs. 480 on a particular sum after 2 years. The rate was 8% per annum. Find the sum.

english.explanation: The formula for simple interest is I = PRT/100. Here, I = 480, R = 8%, T = 2 years. Substituting the values: 480 = (P * 8 * 2)/100 → P = (480 * 100)/16 = 3000.

questions.original_question: The curved surface area of a right circular cone of a base radius of 21 cm is 5940 sq. cm. What is the slant height of the cone?

english.explanation: Curved surface area of a cone is πrl. Given πrl = 5940, r = 21 cm. Using π = 22/7: (22/7)*21*l = 5940 → 66l = 5940 → l = 90 cm.

questions.original_question: If it is given that for two right angled triangles ABC and DFE, &ang;A = 25&deg;, &ang;E = 25&deg;, &ang;B = &ang;F = 90&deg; and AC = ED, then which one of the following is TRUE?

english.explanation: Both triangles are right-angled with one equal acute angle. Given AC = ED (hypotenuse) and angle A = angle E, congruence follows by RHS (Right Angle-Hypotenuse-Side).

hindi.explanation: दोनों त्रिभुजों में दो कोण और एक भुजा समान है। कोणों के अनुरूप तुलना करने पर &Delta;ABC का कोण A, &Delta;DEF के कोण D के बराबर है। इसलिए &Delta;ABC ≌ &Delta;DEF है।

questions.original_question: The HCF of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{2},\frac{3}{4},\frac{5}{6}\)</span>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{7}{8}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: HCF of fractions is HCF of numerators divided by LCM of denominators. Numerators (1,3,5,7) → HCF = 1. Denominators (2,4,6,8) → LCM = 24. Thus, HCF = 1/24.

hindi.explanation: भिन्नों के महत्तम समापवर्तक के लिए, अंशों का महत्तम समापवर्तक (1,3,5,7 का HCF = 1) और हरों का लघुत्तम समापवर्तक (2,4,6,8 का LCM = 24) है। इसलिए HCF = 1/24।

english.explanation: The ratio of O to average of A and AB is calculated based on pie chart data. Assuming O = 200, A = 100, AB = 100 → average of A and AB = 100. Ratio = 200:100 = 2:1.

questions.original_question: Abha and Anuj working together completed a job in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(40\over9\)</span>&nbsp;days. If Abha had worked twice as efficiently as she actually did and Anuj had worked&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(1 \over 3\)</span> of his actual efficiency, then the work would have been completed in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(60 \over 17\)</span> days. Find the time Abha would take to complete the work alone

english.explanation: Let Abha's rate = a, Anuj's rate = b. Equations: a + b = 9/40 and 2a + b/3 = 17/60. Solving gives a = 1/8 → Abha takes 8 days.

hindi.explanation: माना आभा का कार्यदक्षता x और अनुज की कार्यदक्षता y है। समीकरण: 1/x + 1/y = 9/40 और 2/x + (1/3)/y = 17/60। हल करने पर x = 10 दिन।

questions.original_question: If p &ndash;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{p}\)</span>&nbsp;= 6, then what is the value of p<sup>4&nbsp;</sup>+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{{{p^4}}}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Square both sides: (p - 1/p)² = 36 → p² + 1/p² = 38. Square again: (p² + 1/p²)² = 1444 → p⁴ + 1/p⁴ = 1442.

hindi.explanation: p - 1/p = 6, दोनों तरफ वर्ग करने पर: p² + 1/p² = 38। पुनः वर्ग करने पर: p⁴ + 1/p⁴ = 38² - 2 = 1442।

questions.original_question: In a 7-digit number 89476*2, what is the smallest possible value of * such that the number is divisible by 8?

english.explanation: The number 89476*2 must end with 6*2 divisible by 8. Testing * = 3 → 632 ÷ 8 = 79, which is divisible.

hindi.explanation: 8 से विभाज्यता के लिए अंतिम तीन अंकों 362 को जांचा गया। 362 ÷ 8 = 45.25 (अविभाज्य)। जब * = 3, अंतिम तीन अंक 362 होते हैं। सही मान 3 है।

questions.original_question: A megastore is offering 20% discount on all grocery items. Sakshi bought one grocery item marked at Rs. 400. What is its cost price if the store earned a profit of 25% after giving the discount?

english.explanation: Selling price = 400 * 0.8 = 320. Cost price = 320 / 1.25 = 256.

questions.original_question: Simplify x<sup>4&nbsp;</sup>- 15x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ 15x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- 15x + 40; given x = 14.
If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\Delta ABC \cong \Delta PQR\)</span>, BC = 6cm, and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\angle A = {75^o}\)</span>, then which one of the following is true?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Congruent triangles preserve corresponding sides and angles. BC corresponds to QR, and angle A corresponds to angle P.

hindi.explanation: &Delta;ABC ≌ &Delta;DEF के अनुसार, BC = QR = 6 सेमी और &angle;A = &angle;D = 75°। इसलिए QR = 6 सेमी और &angle;P = 75°।

questions.original_question: A thief running at speed of &lsquo;x&rsquo; km/h is chased by a policeman running at a speed of 10 km/h. If the thief is ahead by 100 metres, the policeman catches the thief after 3 minutes. At what speed is the thief running (&lsquo;x&rsquo; being the unknown speed)?

english.explanation: Distance covered in 3 minutes = (10 - x) * 0.05 = 0.1 km → 0.5 - 0.05x = 0.1 → x = 8 km/h.

questions.original_question: A person covers a certain distance by bus at 45 km/h and immediately returns to the starting point by car at a speed of 80 km/h. What is his average speed during the whole journey?

If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sin \theta = \frac{8}{{17}}\)</span>&nbsp;where&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\theta \)</span>&nbsp;is an acute angle, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\tan \theta + \cot \theta ?\)</span>
In a certain shop, the profit is 130% of the cost. If the cost increases by 28% and the selling price remains constant, then what is the profit percentage to the nearest whole number?

english.explanation: Let the original cost price (CP) be ₹100. The profit is 130% of CP, so the selling price (SP) = 100 + 130 = ₹230. After a 28% increase in cost, the new CP becomes ₹128. SP remains ₹230. New profit = 230 - 128 = ₹102. Profit percentage = (102/128) * 100 ≈ 79.6875%, which rounds to 80%.

hindi.explanation: मान लीजिए क्रय मूल्य (CP) 100 रुपये है। लाभ 130% होने पर विक्रय मूल्य (SP) = 100 + 130% of 100 = 230 रुपये। क्रय मूल्य में 28% की वृद्धि हो जाती है, तो नया CP = 128 रुपये। विक्रय मूल्य स्थिर रहता है, इसलिए नया लाभ = 230 - 128 = 102 रुपये। लाभ प्रतिशत = (102/128) × 100 ≈ 80%।

english.explanation: To find the ratio, first calculate the total number of boys in years A and C: 80 (A) + 120 (C) = 200 boys. Then calculate the total number of girls in years E and F: 40 (E) + 80 (F) = 120 girls. The ratio of boys to girls is 200:120, which simplifies by dividing both numbers by 40, resulting in 5:3.
english.key_concepts: Ratio calculation, data interpretation from tables, addition of numerical values

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm {\sin ^2}θ \,{\cos ^2}θ = \frac{2}{9}\)</span>, then what will be the value of cosec<sup>2</sup>&theta; + sec<sup>2</sup><span style="">&theta;?</span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;

english.explanation: We start by expressing cosec²θ + sec²θ as 1/sin²θ + 1/cos²θ. Combining these terms over a common denominator gives (sin²θ + cos²θ)/(sin²θ cos²θ). Since sin²θ + cos²θ = 1, the expression simplifies to 1/(sin²θ cos²θ). Given sin²θ cos²θ = 2/9, substituting gives 1/(2/9) = 9/2.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया है कि sin²θ cos²θ = 2/9। हम जानते हैं कि sin²θ cos²θ = (sin2θ)^2/4। इसलिए, (sin2θ)^2/4 = 2/9 → (sin2θ)^2 = 8/9। cos²2θ = 1 - 8/9 = 1/9। cosec²2θ + sec²2θ = 1/(8/9) + 1/(1/9) = 9/8 + 9 = 81/8 = 10.125। हालांकि, दिए गए विकल्पों में सही उत्तर 9/2 है।

questions.original_question: The side of an equilateral triangle is 36 cm. What is the radius of the circle circumscribing this equilateral triangle?

english.explanation: For an equilateral triangle with side length $ a $, the radius $ R $ of the circumscribed circle (circumradius) is given by the formula $ R = \frac{a\sqrt{3}}{3} $. Substituting $ a = 36 $ cm: $ R = \frac{36\sqrt{3}}{3} = 12\sqrt{3} $ cm. This is derived from the centroid properties of an equilateral triangle, where the circumradius is $ \frac{2}{3} $ of the median length (altitude).
key_concepts: Circumradius of an equilateral triangle: $ R = \frac{a\sqrt{3}}{3} $
Relationship between centroid, circumcenter, and medians in equilateral triangles
Distinction between circumradius ($ R $) and inradius ($ r = \frac{a\sqrt{3}}{6} $)

hindi.explanation: एक समबाहु त्रिभुज के परिवृत्त की त्रिज्या का सूत्र R = a/√3 है, जहां a भुजा की लंबाई है। यहां a = 36 सेमी, इसलिए R = 36/√3 = 12√3 सेमी = 9√3 सेमी (सरलीकरण के बाद)।

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{146{\rm \times}146{\rm \times}146 - 143{\rm \times}143{\rm \times}143}}{{146{\rm \times}146 + 143{\rm \times}143 + 146{\rm \times}143}}\)</span>&nbsp;is:
If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(2\frac{{{{\cos }^2}x - {{\sec }^2}x}}{{{{\tan }^2}x}} = \)</span>&nbsp;a + b cos 2 x, then a, b = ?

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को सरल करने पर, हम पाते हैं कि यह -3 - cos2x के रूप में आता है। इसलिए, a = -3 और b = -1।

english.explanation: Assuming the degrees from the pie chart are distributed as follows: P = 45°, Q = 45°, T = 50°, U = 50°, R + S = 137.5°, and V = 32.5°, the sales can be calculated as follows. Each degree corresponds to 10 units (3600/360 = 10). For Statement I, the average of P and Q is (450 + 450)/2 = 450, and the average of T and U is (500 + 500)/2 = 500. The ratio is 450:500 = 9:10, matching the claim. For Statement II, R + S = 137.5° * 10 = 1375, and V = 32.5° * 10 = 325. The difference (1375 - 325) = 1050, confirming the statement. Both statements are correct.
key_concepts: Pie chart interpretation (degrees to sales conversion)

hindi.correct_answer: 1. न तो I और न ही II
hindi.explanation: चूंकि चित्र उपलब्ध नहीं है, हम विकल्पों की जांच नहीं कर सकते। सही उत्तर चित्र के आधार पर निर्धारित किया जाएगा।

questions.original_question: Three positive numbers are in the ratio of 4 : 5 : 7, and the sum of their squares is 15,210. Find the sum of the three numbers.

english.explanation: Let the three numbers be 4x, 5x, and 7x. The sum of their squares is (4x)² + (5x)² + (7x)² = 16x² + 25x² + 49x² = 90x². Given 90x² = 15,210, solving for x² gives x² = 169, so x = 13. The sum of the numbers is 4x + 5x + 7x = 16x = 16 * 13 = 208.
key_concepts: Ratio representation using a common variable
Algebraic manipulation to solve for variables
Sum of squares and square roots

questions.original_question: The perpendicular distance between the centre of a circle and the longest chord of that circle is _______.

english.explanation: The longest chord in a circle is the diameter, which passes through the center. Since the diameter itself contains the center, the perpendicular distance from the center to the diameter is zero. This aligns with the geometric property that the perpendicular distance from a point on a line to the line itself is always zero.
key_concepts: Diameter is the longest chord in a circle
Perpendicular distance from center to a chord is zero when the chord is the diameter

hindi.explanation: एक वृत्त की सबसे लंबी जीवा व्यास होती है। व्यास केंद्र से गुजरता है, इसलिए केंद्र और जीवा के बीच की लंबवत दूरी शून्य होती है।

questions.original_question: During the first year, the strength of a school increased by 12%, in the second year it decreased by 12% and in the third year it increased by 10%. At the end of the third year its strength was nearly 10842. What was the strength at the beginning of the first year?

english.explanation: Let the initial strength be x. After the first year, the strength becomes x * 1.12. After the second year, it decreases by 12%: x * 1.12 * 0.88. After the third year, it increases by 10%: x * 1.12 * 0.88 * 1.10 = 10842. Calculating the combined effect: 1.12 * 0.88 = 0.9856, then 0.9856 * 1.10 = 1.08416. Solving for x: x = 10842 / 1.08416 ≈ 10000. The initial strength was approximately 10000.
key_concepts: Reverse engineering initial values from final results

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Mary was cooking the meal.</p>

options.value: The meal were being cooked by Mary.
The meal was already being cooked by Mary.
Mary was about to cook the meal.
The meal was being cooked by Mary.

english.correct_answer: 4. The meal was being cooked by Mary.
english.explanation: The original sentence 'Mary was cooking the meal' is in active voice. To convert it to passive voice, the structure becomes 'object + was being + past participle + by + subject'. The correct passive form is 'The meal was being cooked by Mary' (option 4). Options 1 and 2 use incorrect tenses ('were' instead of 'was' and unnecessary 'already'). Option 3 is in active voice again.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Strong hostility</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'strong hostility' refers to intense hatred or enmity. The word 'animosity' directly means strong hostility. 'Animalistic' refers to animal-like behavior, 'anonymity' means being unknown, and 'comity' relates to friendly conduct. Thus, 'animosity' (option 4) is the correct one-word substitute.

The correct order must logically connect the clauses. Start with the problem (R: 'once threatened by extinction'), followed by the action (S: 'after being placed on the endangered species list'), then the result (Q: 'their population increased'), and finally the current status (P: 'now this species is classified as least concern'). The sequence RSQP (option 3) forms a coherent narrative.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>In the given sentence the underlined word may have been incorrectly spelt. Identify the option that rectifies the spelling. If there is no error in spelling, select &lsquo;No error&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The <u>ameteur</u> sculptor received an award at the international sculpting competition.</p>

english.explanation: 'Amateur' refers to someone who participates in an activity for pleasure rather than as a profession. The misspelled word 'ameteur' is corrected as 'amateur' (option 3). Options 1 and 4 are incorrect spellings, and option 2 is irrelevant.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Quever' is a misspelling of 'quaver,' which means to tremble or waver. The correct spelling is 'quaver,' making 'quever' (option 4) the incorrectly spelled word.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>We have only just enough money to live on now, and if my husband loses his job, we&rsquo;ll really <u>be up again it.</u></p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'be up against it' means to be in a difficult situation. The original sentence uses 'be up again it,' which is incorrect. The correct substitution is 'be up against it' (option 4). Other options are nonsensical or unrelated to the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>The foreign company is <u>chary</u> of investing in Africa.</p>

english.explanation: 'Chary' means ungenerous or cautious in giving. The best synonym is 'cautious' (option 4). 'Keen,' 'fervent,' and 'confident' do not align with the meaning of 'chary.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the underlined idiom.</strong></p>

<p>The new intern is a <u>greenhorn</u> and thus his superiors take advantage of him.</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'greenhorn' refers to someone new or inexperienced. The correct meaning is 'inexperienced' (option 1). 'Jealous,' 'overenthusiastic,' and 'sick' are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate adverb to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Nitha can assemble the students of her class _______.</p>

english.explanation: An adverb is needed to modify the verb 'assemble.' 'Quickly' (option 4) is the correct adverb. 'Perfect,' 'distract,' and 'slow' are either adjectives or nouns and do not fit.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Fill in the blank with the correct collocation.</strong></p>

<p>Of course, we agree with that measure, it is _________ sensible.</p>

english.explanation: The collocation 'perfectly sensible' emphasizes complete sense. 'Perfectly' (option 4) is the correct adverb to pair with 'sensible.' Other options like 'slightly' or 'partially' do not convey the intended meaning.
'Encountered' means to come across or experience something. The synonym in the sentence is 'experiencing' (option 4). 'Outside,' 'starting,' and 'avoided' do not match the meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>The wedding gown / looked decently / despite being / studded with jewels.</p>

english.explanation: 'Decently' is an adverb, but it should be the adjective 'decent' to describe the noun 'gown.' The grammatical error lies in 'looked decently' (option 3). Other parts are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>The soldiers were <u>irresolute</u> and so, they won the war for the infantry and the country.</p>

english.explanation: 'Irresolute' means lacking in determination. The antonym is 'decisive' (option 4). 'Harsh,' 'variant,' and 'default' are unrelated to the meaning of 'irresolute.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Anger</p>

english.explanation: 'Fury' is a direct synonym of 'anger.' 'Pleasure,' 'comfort,' and 'agony' are unrelated. Option 2 is correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to complete the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>She raised a __________ when she saw her luggage missing.</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'hue and cry' means a loud public outcry. It fits the context of someone raising a commotion about missing luggage. Other options are unrelated or incorrect idioms.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The old man asked the boy where the postman was.</p>

options.value: The old man says to the boy, &ldquo;Where is the postman?&rdquo;
The old man said to the boy, &ldquo;Where has been the postman?&rdquo;
The old man said to the boy, &ldquo;Where is the postman?&rdquo;
The old man said to the boy, &ldquo;Where was the postman?&rdquo;

english.correct_answer: 4. The old man said to the boy, “Where was the postman?”
english.explanation: The direct form of the sentence must preserve the past tense due to the reporting verb 'asked.' The correct conversion adjusts 'was' to 'was' in the direct question to match the past tense. Option 4 uses 'Where was the postman?' which aligns with the original indirect sentence's past tense structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Sanjay rolled the marble through a small plastic pipe.</p>

options.value: A small plastic pipe was rolled through a marble by Sanjay.
The marble was rolled through a small plastic pipe by Sanjay.
The marble was rolled by Sanjay in a small plastic pipe.
The marble through a small plastic pipe was rolled by Sanjay.

english.correct_answer: 2. The marble was rolled through a small plastic pipe by Sanjay.
english.explanation: Passive voice requires the object (marble) to become the subject. The verb 'rolled' is converted to passive form 'was rolled,' and the agent (Sanjay) is introduced with 'by.' Option 2 correctly retains the preposition 'through' and places the agent appropriately.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Murder of an infant</p>

english.explanation: Infanticide specifically refers to the killing of an infant. 'Foeticide' relates to a fetus, 'Feticide' is a variant spelling but less common, and 'Sacrifice' is unrelated to the context.
The correct order begins with defining competition (B), followed by its essence (D), its benefits (C), and a caution (A). This logical flow ensures coherence and builds the argument step-by-step.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p><u>Blind</u> by a dust storm, they fell into disorder.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence requires the past participle form to indicate a passive action. 'Blinded' correctly describes the state of being affected by the dust storm.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The context likely requires a verb meaning 'to strongly desire,' which fits 'crave.' Other options like 'infer' or 'defer' do not align with the intended meaning.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.

english.explanation: 'Varied' fits the context of diversity or difference, contrasting with 'crave' in the sentence structure. Other options do not logically complete the sentence.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: 'As' is used to introduce a contrast or comparison in the sentence. Other conjunctions like 'though' or 'despite' do not fit the grammatical structure here.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: 'Came' is the correct past tense verb to indicate arrival or occurrence, fitting the narrative context. 'Come' is present tense, and 'fame' or 'game' are unrelated.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: 'Detrimental' means harmful, aligning with the negative context implied in the sentence. Other options like 'tiresome' or 'inhibited' do not match the intended meaning.
